attributes.action: Make owners keep Yayland trees 2METRES AS THE LAW
attributes.additional_details:
My Health is getting worse, due to the fact, I have very little nateral daylight into my home.
As in the title, the law is being broken by an arrogant neighbour. There are 18 Yaylandi trees, inside their garden, BUT their are 18 on the pavement.
It streches from the front garden of their house, all along thei house AND their back garden,
As I said ALL Nurserys in the Southampton Area, all agree with me.
